works.description:
Press release published on November 9, 2012 titled "Popcap Games And The ADA Help Stop Zombie Mouth" .
Excerpt - "The American Dental Association (ADA) and PopCap Games today announced that their first collaborative Stop Zombie Mouth campaign has been a great success. More than 1 million trading cards were distrubuted by dentists across the United States leading up to Halloween, while PopCap’s Plants Vs ZombiesÔ was downloaded by trick or treaters more than 250,000 times in the week following the holiday. "

Although this was a press release, the infringement also includes all related links and author bio as shown on our website, duplicating our exact presentation.
